channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon retire 40 % de son prix à ce chargeur 2-en-1 compatible MagSafe et Qi2
item.description: Ugreen propose de nombreux accessoires pour téléphone, et quelques produits qui sortent du lot comme ce chargeur à induction 2-en-1 certifié Qi2 et MagSafe dont le prix passe de 39 euros à 23 euros seulement sur Amazon.

item.title: Lenovo’s next gaming laptop may have a rollable OLED screen that stretches ultrawide
item.description: Lenovo has already demonstrated its ability to put rollable OLEDs into laptops by graduating last year from demo concept models to shipping the ThinkBook Plus Gen 6, an actual device you can buy. It has a built-in mechanism that expands the screen vertically to give you more screen real estate for typing and scrolling. However, […]

item.title: Elon Musk’s Optimus Robot Collapses in a Hilariously Suspicious Way
item.description: Musk says he's going to make 1 million robots per year by 2030.

item.title: It’s ugly, it’s beautiful, it’s how you know a game might be a classic
item.description: At their biggest and most expensive, video games all sort of look the same. The reason often comes down to simple economics: More resources means more costs that need to be recouped, and historically the way publishers have done that is by being comically risk-averse. Hence the glut of semi-realistic rocky wastelands that look like […]

item.title: ICEBlock developer sues Trump administration over App Store removal
item.description: Joshua Aaron, the developer of the ICEBlock app, is suing Attorney General Pam Bondi, US Homeland Security Secretary Kirsti Noem, acting director of ICE Todd Lyons, White House "Border Czar" Tom Homan, and other federal officials over the Trump administration's "unlawful threats" made against Aaron and its actions to pressure Apple to pull the app […]...

item.title: Apple's UI executive poached by Meta, and three other executives leave in Apple AI exodus
item.description: The number of Apple execs leaving the company continues to rise, but most are being replaced.

item.title: Analogue is weaponizing your nostalgia with these translucent versions of its 3D console
item.description: Analogue just announced new colorways for its recently-launched Analogue 3D console. The appropriately-named Funtastic limited-edition consoles are heavily inspired by Nintendo's translucent N64 models from the late 1990s. Analogue even borrowed the Funtastic branding. In other words, these are going for the nostalgic jugular for gamers of a certain age. There's even a see-through green colorway that calls to mind the Nintendo 64 variant that shipped as a bundle with Donkey Kong 64. Just imagine booting up that bad boy as you roam around the house spouting the lyrics of the DK rap song. Analog...

item.title: Les 3 voitures électriques favorites de Survoltés en décembre 2025
item.description: Les voitures électriques demeurent une véritable attraction pour le grand public. Voici le top 3 des modèles que nous avons adoré tester sur Frandroid le mois dernier.

item.title: Amazon Clears Out This Eureka Vacuum at a Price Several Times Cheaper Than Dyson for Early Christmas
item.description: It's time to tidy up now that the holidays are here, so make sure you don't miss out on this deal.

item.title: The Best Way to Play Your N64 Games Now Looks Even Better
item.description: The Analogue 3D now comes in all the transparent colorways you never got as a kid.

item.title: The Fictional Characters and Shows We Lost in 2025
item.description: To all the sci-fi, fantasy, and horror characters, TV series, and other creations that took their final bows this year: we'll miss (most of) you!

item.title: A first look at Google’s Project Aura glasses built with Xreal
item.description: Teased at Google I/O, Project Aura is a collaboration between Xreal and Google. It's the second Android XR device (the first being Samsung's Galaxy XR headset) and is expected to launch in 2026. Putting it on, I get why the term "smart glasses" doesn't exactly fit. Is it a headset? Smart glasses? Both? Those were […]

item.title: Google details security measures for Chrome’s agentic features
item.description: Google details how it is enacting security guardrails before rolling out agentic capabilities on Chrome.

item.title: Win a £1,000 Amazon voucher and free Ring doorbells for your whole street by sharing a Christmas carol
item.description: The competition was inspired by five boys from Denny, Scotland, who were recorded on a Ring doorbell singing for their neighbours.

item.title: Tech's biggest winners of 2025
item.description: Every December, the Engadget staff compiles a list of the year’s biggest winners. We scour over articles from the previous 12 months to determine the people, companies, products and trends that made the most impact over the course of the year. Not all of that influence is positive, however, and some selections may also appear on our list of biggest losers. Still, sit back and enjoy our picks for the biggest winners of 2025.Nintendo Switch 2Playing Mario Kart World on the Switch 2 in handheld mode.Sam Rutherford for EngadgetAside from a big bump in battery life that many were hoping for, Ninten...

item.title: Here's how Google is laying the foundation for our mixed reality future
item.description: Today, during the XR edition of The Android Show, Google showed off a bunch of updates and new features headed to its mixed reality OS. And while most of the news was aimed at developers, I got a chance to demo some of the platform's expanded capabilities on a range of hardware including Samsung's Galaxy XR headset, two different reference designs and an early version of Xreal's Project Aura smart glasses and I came away rather impressed. So here's a rundown of what I saw and how it will impact the rapidly growing ecosystem of head-mounted displays.First up was one of Google's reference design...

item.title: You can buy your Instacart groceries without leaving ChatGPT
item.description: Shoppers will be able to go from recipe planning to checkout within the ChatGPT window.

item.title: Pebble tease une nouvelle montre ronde : le retour inattendu de la Time Round se précise pour le 9 décembre
item.description: Pebble a publié une image mystérieuse annonçant une nouveauté imminente. Tout porte à croire qu'une version modernisée de la Pebble Time Round est dans les tuyaux.

item.title: 'HBO Max will stay' even after Netflix deal says Warner Bros. CEO David Zaslav
item.description: Move over Mark Twain, this time its HBO Max whose death may have been greatly exaggerated – according to Warner Bros. Discovery chief David Zaslav.

item.title: Company Discovers Hundreds of New Deep Sea Creatures While Figuring Out How to Mine Their Home
item.description: The discovery could hold serious implications for the mining industry.

item.title: Some Windows 11 apps have a massive RAM problem – and this app is the worst offender
item.description: Amid a RAM crisis, Discord and a few other applications using Chromium and the Electron framework are causing RAM spikes for PC users.

item.title: "We're going to be watching really closely" – politicians around the world are taking inspiration from Australia's social media ban
item.description: As Australia implements its strict age verification regime, worldwide politicians are taking notes. So, which country will be next to kick off teens from social media apps?

item.title: Sneeit WordPress RCE flaw allows hackers to add themselves as admin - here's how to stay safe
item.description: A critical flaw in a WordPress add-on was recently patched, which allows crooks to add a rogue admin account to the site.

item.title: Best Buy launches a huge Apple sale — and it includes AirPods, MacBooks, iPads, and more for record-low prices
item.description: There's a limited-time Apple sale underway at Best Buy, so I've hand-picked the 14 best deals on iPads, MacBooks, Apple Watches, AirPods and more.

item.title: HP OmniBook 5 14 review: an OLED is almost enough
item.description: You know what I love more than OLEDs? Cheap OLEDs. And that's exactly what drew me to the 14-inch HP OmniBook 5. It's a $700 Windows laptop with a Snapdragon X Plus processor and an OLED screen. That means it should have great battery life and a beautiful screen. I consider these important in any […]

item.title: « Trop violent » : ce patron chinois finit au tapis pour prouver que son robot est réel
item.description: Dans une vidéo, le PDG d'EngineAI se fait violemment frapper par son robot T800. Un coup de pub brutal pour prouver que la machine est bien réelle et prête au combat.

item.title: What a deal! MSI’s Windows 11 Pro laptop is under $500 and packs an Intel Core 7 150U processor, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB NVMe SSD — but at this price, it could sell out at any moment
item.description: MSI's laptop is now just $499, a staggering $451 off the usual price of $950, but it won't be around for long.

item.title: NordVPN extends phishing and malware protection to your inbox
item.description: NordVPN just launched a new email protection feature to stop phishing in its tracks. It scans and flags dodgy links right inside your browser-based email client on macOS and Windows.

item.title: Ce pack Samsung Galaxy S25 + Chromebook Go est à un super prix chez la Fnac et Darty
item.description: Le Samsung Galaxy S25, actuel fleuron de la marque sud-coréenne, se tient actuellement aux côtés d'un laptop Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Go dans un pack dont le prix a considérablement chuté : la Fnac et Darty le proposent à 899 euros au lieu de 1 468 euros.

item.title: The ASUS ROG Xbox Ally just hit a new record-low price
item.description: Right now, you can score the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally (72 A, 168GB RAM, 512GB SSD) for just $489.99, down from $599.99.

item.title: TikTok adds a space for organizing content with others, teases ‘Shared Feeds’
item.description: Shared Feeds will surface new content tailored to both users' tastes, such as sports, winter activities, and their favorite creators.

item.title: Analogue is restocking its 4K N64 and making it more colorful
item.description: As if the Analogue 3D wasn't nostalgic enough, the 4K N64 emulator will soon be available in a handful of transparent "Funtastic" limited editions going on sale on December 10th at 8AM Pacific/11AM Eastern. The vibrant transparent models will be available "in highly limited quantities," and they'll cost more than the standard model at $299. […]

item.title: Trump’s EPA Plans to Raise Threshold for ‘Safe’ Formaldehyde Exposure
item.description: The EPA has revised its assessment of the health risks posed by the carcinogen, less than a year after the Biden administration issued its own verdict.

item.title: Uber will start selling trip and takeout data to marketers
item.description: Uber will begin selling customer data to marketers, according to a report by Business Insider. The company's ad division just launched a new insights platform called Uber Intelligence that's tasked with hoovering up and selling trip and delivery data. The data will technically be anonymous, via the use of a platform called LiveRamp. This will "let advertisers securely combine their customer data with Uber's to help surface insights about their audiences, based on what they eat and where they travel." Basically, it'll provide a broad view of local consumer trends based on collected data. Uber g...

item.title: Trump hosts Kennedy Center Honors, praising honorees and slamming his foes
item.description: Since returning to office, Trump has made the center a touchstone in a broader attack against ‘woke’ anti-American culture. President Donald Trump on Sunday hosted the Kennedy Center Honors and praised Sylvester Stallone, Kiss, Gloria Gaynor, Michael Crawford, and George Strait, the slate of honorees he helped choose, as being “legendary in so many ways.”...

item.title: Skateboarding is better in hell
item.description: Skate Story is two very different things simultaneously. On the one hand, it's a visceral take on skateboarding, providing a tight, fast, ground-level view as you brute-force your way through tricks and combos. But it's also a surrealist trip through the underworld where you control a skateboarding demon who faces off against the devil. Think […]

item.description: It's hard to find the right gift for a Pokémon enthusiast, but don't worry, I've used my 30 years of experience to pick some awesome presents for the holidays.

item.title: Best Guess Live is Netflix's take on HQ Trivia
item.description: Netflix has already committed to reviving Star Search for its streaming service, and now the company is turning its attention to a different type of live show: HQ Trivia. Netflix's Best Guess Live is an attempt to revive the late 2010s app-based show with what the company is calling its first "weekday mobile game show."Best Guess Live will be hosted by Howie Mandel (Deal or No Deal, America's Got Talent) and Hunter March (Sugar Rush) and will broadcast Monday through Friday at 8PM ET / 5PM PT. The game seems like it will lean on multiple choice questions much like HQ Trivia did, and will rewar...

item.description: We've rounded up the best free dating apps to try this year. Find love, a fling, or anything in between — no credit card required.

item.title: Heat pump startup Quilt raises $20M Series B to expand sales
item.description: Quilt has sold nearly 1,000 units in the U.S. and Canada, and the new funding should help expand sales operations to more states and provinces.

item.description: La marque Acer est un mastodonte sur le secteur des ordinateurs portables. Vous aimez leurs machines mais vous ne savez pas quel modèle à choisir ? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs PC portables Acer à l'heure actuelle.

item.title: The developer behind ICEBlock is suing the federal government
item.description: The makers of ICEBlock, the community-based reporting app for ICE sightings and activity, are suing the federal government, alleging "unlawful threats" made by Trump administration officials led to the app's removal from app stores. The suit centers on free speech violations and accuses the administration of coercing Apple into taking down the app in October. Google began taking down similar apps around the same time. Josh Aaron developed ICEBlock in response to the Trump administration's crackdown on illegal immigration. The app allowed users to pin ICE agent locations on a map as well as add...

item.title: 250 Environmental Orgs Ask Congress for Moratorium on New Data Centers
item.description: The "AI and crypto frenzy" is threatening American lives, the organizations say.

item.title: Musk Says Starlink, Not NASA, Is SpaceX’s Cash Cow
item.description: Amid media reports of skyrocketing valuation and a potential IPO for SpaceX, the company could have a lot to lose next year.

item.title: Trump says Netflix-Warner Bros. deal ‘could be a problem’
item.description: If approved by regulators, the merger would put two of the world’s biggest streaming services under the same ownership. President Donald Trump said Sunday that a deal struck by Netflix to buy Warner Bros. Discovery “could be a problem” because of the size of the combined market share.

item.title: The 47 Best REI Cyber Week Outdoor Deals (2025)
item.description: Today is the final day of REI's sale, and deals are disappearing fast. Grab what you need with these great deals on tents, packs, and merino wool.
